detail_desc: Two pairs of leggings in different colours of washed stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Knee-length dress in sturdy satin with a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener in one side, a gathered seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Lined.
Tights with extra space for a growing tummy. 40 denier.
V-neck top in softly draping silk with lace at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps that meet at the back of the neck and decorative straps at the back. Rounded hem.
Short cardigan in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a V-neck and large buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed viscose jersey with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a slit at the back.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs and a seam at the waist with a peplum. Elastication at the back and ties at the front.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.

Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a faceted, heart-shaped button at the top and long sleeves.
Lace hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Jersey top in an organic cotton blend with elastication and a flounce around the neckline.

prod_name: TP MAGNUS sweatpant w panel SB
detail_desc: Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour side stripes. Elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Jacket in soft pile with a high collar, large patch front pockets and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Lined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Cropped off-the-shoulder top in soft fabric with smocking at the top and hem, and long wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.

Track jacket in padded nylon with a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket and side pockets, all with a concealed zip, and covered elastication at the cuffs. The jacket has a THERMOLITE® T-Down EcoMade filling, which is down-like insulation that is lightweight yet provides superior warmth and breathability. The filling is made entirely from recycled PET fibre.
Short-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Belt in imitation leather with eyelets and a buckle in metal. Width 2.5 cm.
Kaftan in soft, airy jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a stand-up collar and long sleeves with a wide flounce at the cuffs.
5-pocket, high-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details and slim legs with raw-edge hems.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a boat neck.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow, double-strap sides and string back.
Hard smartphone case in marble-patterned plastic. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.

Waist bag in imitation leather with a concealed zip at the front, an outer compartment with a concealed zip at the back and two inner compartments. Lined. Adjustable strap with a plastic fastener. Metal carabiner hook on one of the zips. Size 6x17x30 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Knee-length dress in an airy viscose weave. Small stand-up collar with a V-shaped opening at the front, gently dropped shoulders and short sleeves with turn-ups. Seam under the bust with a drawstring made from cotton rope. Unlined.
Gym gloves in mesh with lightly padded, reinforced palms for optimum grip and comfort, and a hook and loop tab at the wrists.
Pool shoes with moulded soles.
Body in jersey crêpe and microfibre with short sleeves and an open back with a knot detail. Laser-cut edges at the bottom and press-studs at the crotch.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with wide shoulder straps, lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck opening at the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Boxy, V-neck cardigan in a soft rib knit made from a cotton blend. Buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Slightly wider jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Fine-knit fingerless gloves with matching, rib-knit wrist warmers that can be worn together or separately.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim. Slightly looser fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs. Some of the cotton content of the jeans is recycled.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Ankle-length trousers in a nylon rustle weave with a high waist and patch front pockets. Elastication and an elastic drawstring at the waist and hems.
Shorts in soft, washed cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Top in jersey crêpe with short cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a pile-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Lightly padded parka in cotton twill with a high collar and lined hood with a folding trim around the edge. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and a tab with a press-stud at the cuffs. Quilted lining.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Fabric trainers with a metallic finish with concealed elastication at the front, rubber toe caps and a loop at the back. Fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with long sleeves and no buttons.
Skirt in washed, superstretch twill with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft alpaca-blend weave with a lightly brushed finish. Fringe trims along the short sides.
Short-sleeved dresses in soft cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flared skirt.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a terry motif on the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short, fitted pencil skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, narrow, detachable belt and a concealed zip at the back. Lined. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, gathered elastication at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Oversized jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in stretch, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Swim cap with a peak at the front and a flap at the back to protect the back of the neck.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and a low crotch.
Hat in a soft, chunky rib-knit cashmere blend with a turned-up hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Vest top in soft viscose jersey with a low-cut back.

Calf-length, airy dress in a crinkled silk and cotton weave with a short frill and drawstring at the neck and an opening at the top. Long, wide sleeves with flared drawstring cuffs, a seam at the waist with a drawstring that ties at one side and a wide skirt. Unlined.
Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front, a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and chest pocket. Partly concealed press-stud fastening at the crotch and down the legs.
Metal rings in various designs. Three of the rings are smooth.
Small backpack in woven fabric with imitation leather details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Lined. Size 11x21x26 cm.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in a linen and viscose weave with a V-neck, notch lapels and buttons at the front. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated waist with a detachable tie belt, side pockets and wide legs.
Short skirt in crinkled chiffon with flounced tiers and a high waist with wide smocking. Jersey lining.
Gloves in soft imitation leather with elastication at the cuffs. Soft pile lining.
Ankle-length trousers in a cotton weave with a high waist, pleats at the top, a detachable tie belt, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Wide, ankle-length trousers woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
V-neck top in viscose satin with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a lace trim at the top and lace sections at the front.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains in various designs, one with a pendant. Adjustable length, 38-46 cm.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Regular fit.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft rib knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft. Soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Trainers in nylon and imitation suede with a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and patterned soles.
